[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Generate larger faction bases. Their size and manpower evolve with time. It also factors in the difficulty level, and some randomness. A high-risk, high-reward challenge.
Safe to add/remove in-game.
For compatibility with other mods changing faction bases, check [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2366709688]Choose your enemy base[/url] from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198036011663/myworkshopfiles/]BrokenBed[/url].
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active.
